name: Bandit Shooter
description:
A game I made in Unity, in a Game Programming class at my university.

The controls are shown in the game.

  • There is no way to win, but it will save your high score, and remember it for when you open the game again.
  • Take three hits and you lose. The Shield powerup provides you with one additional hit, and lasts until you take damage.

Songs Used:

  1. Grim Outlook (composed by me, in Beepbox.co)
  2. Hold the Line (Enemy Outpost) - Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity
  3. BGM06adventure - Orchestral Music Pro (downloaded from the Unity Asset Store)
  4. Free Adventure Track 3 - Free Game Music Collection (downloaded from the Unity Asset Store)
  5. None

Have fun!
